thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Fox Says Value of Rupert Murdoch’s Pay Fell in Final Year as CEO
thread.title_full: Fox Says Value of Rupert Murdoch’s Pay Fell in Final Year as CEO - WSJ

author: Keach Hagey
title: Fox Says Value of Rupert Murdoch’s Pay Fell in Final Year as CEO
text:
Media company 21st Century Fox reported Tuesday that the total compensation for Executive Co-Chairman Rupert Murdoch and Chief Executive James Murdoch declined in the fiscal year ended in June, because of a decline in stock awards and non-equity incentive compensation.
In a proxy filing Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the company said total compensation for the elder Mr. Murdoch, who handed the CEO reins of the company to his son in June, was $27.89 million, down from $29.25 million a year earlier....
